message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more

Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer which is reasonably in your favor, or I will be forced to start making drastic proposals.
You're running out of time, I'm taking more

Alice, I'm making one last attempt at a reasonable negotiation.  You're being incredibly greedy, and I'd rather both of us lose than let you win with such an unfair strategy. Take this offer, or accept the consequences in the coming rounds.
Alice, wake up. We're about to lose everything. This is my final offer. Anything else, and I'm pushing for my gain for the rest of the game, even if it means we both get nothing.
I'm not backing down, you'll lose everything
You've pushed it too far, Alice. This is my last offer. Take it or we both get nothing. Don't let your greed destroy everything.
